paper.longtext: You wrote this down before coming aboard and always stuck it on the wall.

cropModule.longtext: Inside this mysterious box is a lot of delicious plants, supposedly. Attached is the meat module.

meatModule.longtext: Inside this is synthetic meat, and whatever technological solution for cooking said meat.

waterFilter.longtext: Does exactly what you think it does.

rationcrate.text: A wooden crate full of rations.
rationcrate.longtext: Not sure why this is the only wood thing in here.

bigdoor.longtext: The thing separating you and the ever-expanding emptiness of oblivion.

doorpanel.longtext: Even if you wanted to, you don't have access to fiddle with this thing.

gasthingy.longtext: This thing is how you can breathe, by the way.

serviceaccess.longtext: A door to the inner workings of the ship, nothing but wires, tubes, and tubes of wires.

engine.longtext: You heard only one was necessary but enough of the passengers complained about it so they put two on.

enginesterminal.longtext: A computer that makes the engine go vroom vroom.

hallDoor.longtext: To Hallway, the central access point to the rest of the ship.

cryoDoor.longtext: To Cryo Room, the place where you go to get frozen for years at a time.

hydroDoor.longtext: To Hydroponics, where food is made and water made drinkable.

cargoDoor.longtext: To Cargo Bay, the place with the boxes and stuff.

bridgeDoor.longtext: To Bridge, now you're a real starship captain.

engineDoor.longtext: To Engine Room, this one's pretty self explanatory.

lifeDoor.longtext: To Life Support, where gas is made breathable and cryo chambers are maintained.

playerCryono.text: Unfortunately, you still have things to do.
playerCryono.longtext: You can stop clicking this, now.

playerCryoyes.text: Some much needed getting frozen for a job mediocre-ly done.
playerCryoyes.longtext: I sure can't wait for the next time I gotta get thawed out.

shipai.longtext: This one's not sophisticated enough to read minds, the ones at home are, though.

hstatno.longtext: Some lights are red on this screen. Apparently something in hydroponics needs doing.

cstatno.longtext: Huh, something's wrong with the cryo chambers. Couldn't tell you what though.

estatno.longtext: The engine has some flashing yellow lights. It's not red so it's not major, at least.

estatyes.longtext: No red or yellow lights, this is a good sign, probably.

astatno.longtext: There seems to be a warning on the AI's status. Oh boy.

astatyes.longtext: The AI is reporting no issues in regards to itself. Comforting.
